meanings.definition: A large predatory tuna with long pectoral fins.
meanings.sent1: The albacore swam swiftly through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We grilled some albacore for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: Why did the albacore bring a fishing rod to the party?
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as fierce as an albacore hunting for prey.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the albacore glistened under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The flesh of this fish used as food.
meanings.sent1: I made a delicious sandwich with albacore.
meanings.sent2: The sushi chef prepared fresh albacore sashimi.
meanings.sent3: The albacore decided to start a food truck selling fish tacos.
meanings.sent4: His love for cooking was like the tenderness of albacore meat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of grilled albacore filled the kitchen with a savory scent.
